hnx.readwrite package#

Submodules#

hnx.readwrite.load module#

hnx.readwrite.load.check_existence(file_name: str, file_type: str)[source]#

Check if a file exists. :param file_name: :type file_name: str. Name of the file :param file_type: :type file_type: str. Type of the file

Returns:

bool

Return type:

True if the file exists, False otherwise.

hnx.readwrite.load.load_hypergraph(file_name: str, file_type: str)[source]#

Load a hypergraph from a file. :param file_name: :type file_name: str : name of the file :param file_type: :type file_type: str : type of the file

Returns:

Hypergraph

Return type:

the loaded hypergraph

hnx.readwrite.save module#

hnx.readwrite.save.save_hypergraph(hypergraph: Hypergraph, file_name, file_type)[source]#

Save a hypergraph to a file. :param hypergraph: :type hypergraph: Hypergraph : the hypergraph to save :param file_name: :type file_name: str : name of the file :param file_type: :type file_type: str : type of the file

Returns:

None

Return type:

the hypergraph is saved to a file
